headline: Stryker to host investor day
summary: Portage, Michigan, Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Stryker (NYSE:SYK) announced that it will host an Investor Day on Thursday, November 13, 2025, at 2:30 p.m. Eastern Time, in Mahwah, New Jersey. A live audio webcast of the session, along with a replay, will be accessible on Stryker’s official website at www.stryker.com. The recording will be archived on the Investor Relations section of the site. About Stryker Stryker is a global leader in medical technologies and, together with our customers
